author: Peter Nicholas
title: Trump Names Tax Lawyer Charles Rettig to Run IRS
text:
WASHINGTON—The White House announced Thursday that President Donald Trump will nominate Charles Rettig, a California tax lawyer, to run the Internal Revenue Service, which is implementing the GOP tax overhaul this year.
Mr. Rettig, if confirmed by the Senate, will face a number of challenges at the agency. With the new tax law kicking in this year, the IRS needs to update forms, create new definitions, write regulations and field questions from taxpayers, which tend to increase when rules change.
